frontmatter.title: How to automate REST API end-to-end tests in a CI environment with Postman and Newman
frontmatter.description: Postman is a great tool to explore REST APIs. You can build requests and try them out to get quick feedback. Then you can persist them as collections to make sure that the knowledge doesn't get lost.
